thread.title: Nice hotel in good location
thread.title_full: Nice hotel in good location - Review of Hotel Indigo London Tower Hill, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Anon092
title: Nice hotel in good location
text: Nice hotel in good location. Comfortable rooms and friendly staff. Near Tower of London and Tower Bridge. Handy for Aldgate and Tower Hill underground stations. Nice touches included quality toiletries and free water, etc from mini bar. Only slight downsides were the noisy plumbing/heating system, the early morning hoovering and poor television reception on Sky channels. Also quite expensive. But overall recommended.
